title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as Club
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs club login credentials
and Clicks Log in
custom_expected:
THEN User successfully logins to Club login
AND Home display for that club is displayed.

title: User navigates to Intl Signing Bonus Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Intl Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Intl Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: User verifies signing period defaults to current
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Intl Signing Bonus utility
custom_steps: WHEN User verifies Signing Period
custom_expected: THEN it is the current signing period (2017-2018)

title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as Club
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs login credentials
and Clicks Log in
custom_expected:
THEN User successfully logins to Club login
AND Home display for that club is displayed.

title: User navigates to Intl Signing Bonus Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Intl Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Intl Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: Club scrolls through signing bonuses; verifies Actual Bonuses amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Intl Signing Bonus Utility
custom_steps: WHEN User scrolls through utility
custom_expected:
THEN User sees players listed in order of Proj. Signing Bonus or Actual Bonus amount (largest to smallest)
AND all Actual Bonus amounts in the rows equals Actual Bonuses total amount below the table

title: Verify all rows less than $10,000 are an exception and not included in Total
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Intl Signing Bonus Utility
custom_steps: WHEN any actual bonus amount is $10,000 or less
custom_expected:
THEN it should be highlighted green to indicate it is an exception
AND all rows $10,000 or less totaled together should equal Less Exceptions value below the table
AND Actual Bonuses amount minus the Less Exceptions value equals Total Signing Bonuses value below the table **(Actual Bonuses - Less Exceptions = Total Signing Bonuses)**

title: Players are linked to their player profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Intl Signing Bonus utility
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks on a player's name on the Intl Signing Bonus utility
custom_expected: THEN The user is directed to the player's profile

title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as Club
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs login credentials 
and Clicks Log in
custom_expected:
THEN User successfully logins to Club login
AND Home display for that club is displayed.

title: User navigates to Intl Signing Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Intl Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Intl Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: User goes to a player's Minor Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Intl Signing Bonus Utility
custom_steps: WHEN User selects signed date of a row (make note of Actual Bonus amount for reference later)
custom_expected: THEN Minor Contract of that player opens

title: User expands addendum B
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is in a Minor Contract from Intl Signing Bonus Utility
custom_steps: WHEN User expands Addendum B
custom_expected: THEN Signing Bonus, Dual Sports, Mexican Assignment Agreement clause should be active in Addendum B.

title: User verifies signing bonus/dual sport/mexican assignment amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is at addendum B in a minor contract
custom_steps: WHEN User expands active signing bonus, dual sport, or mexican assignment agreement.
custom_expected: THEN Total Actual value in addendum B matches Actual Bonus value from Intl Signing Bonus Utility

title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as Club
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs club login credentials
AND Clicks login
custom_expected: THEN User successfully logs into ebis 2.5 homepage

title: User navigates to Intl Signing Bonus Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Intl Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Intl Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: User clicks edit button
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is viewing Intl Signing Bonus utility widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks edit button
custom_expected: THEN the Intl Signing Bonus utility widget goes into edit mode

title: User adds a row to the table
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Intl Signing bonus Utility
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks the add row button
custom_expected: THEN a new row is added to the signing bonus table

title: User enters player name and projected signing bonus
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on Intl signing bonus utility
AND and is in edit mode
AND has added a new row to the signing bonus table
custom_steps:
WHEN User enters a name into the Player field of the new row
AND enters an amount in the Proj. Signing Bonus fields of the new row
custom_expected: THEN both the name and the amount should show in the table, still in edit mode

title: User clicks Save
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has added a new row with fields populated
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN the new row is successfully saved to the table in view mode

title: Toggle Include Projected Signings to Yes
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is still on the Intl Signing Bonus Utility page
custom_steps: WHEN user sets Include Projected Signings to Yes
custom_expected:
THEN a row named Projected Bonuses is added below the table
AND the value matches what was entered for the projected row (if it's the first/only projected value)
AND the value is included in calculating Total Signing Bonuses value **(Actual Bonuses + Projected Bonuses - Less Exceptions = Total Signing Bonuses)**

title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as Club
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs login credentials 
and Clicks Log in
custom_expected:
THEN User successfully logins to Club login
AND Home display for that club is displayed.

title: User navigates to Intl Signing Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Intl Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Intl Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: User sees Signing Bonus Pool
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Intl signing bonus utility page
custom_steps: WHEN user checks Signing Bonus Pool amount at the top of the page
custom_expected: THEN this value should match the bolded total in the Signing Bonus Pool table at the bottom of the page

title: DEPRECATED - Check to see if CB-A pick increases pool 500,000
custom_preconds:
NOTE: Deprecated test per Ethan bc clubs manually enter the data, data will never be stable enough to test via automation

GIVEN User is on the Intl signing bonus utility page
custom_steps: WHEN User toggles to ORG TB
custom_expected:
THEN in the Signing Bonus Pool table there should be an entry for CB - Round B with an Amount of 1,000,000
AND the date should be blank
AND the Original Pool checkbox should be checked

title: DEPRECATED - Check to see if CB-B pick increases pool 1,000,000
custom_preconds:
NOTE: Deprecated test per Ethan bc clubs manually enter the data, data will never be stable enough to test via automation

GIVEN User is on the Intl signing bonus utility page
custom_steps: WHEN User toggles to Org ARI
custom_expected:
THEN in the Signing Bonus Pool table there should be an entry for CB - Round B with an Amount of 1,000,000
AND the date should be blank
AND the Original Pool checkbox should be checked

custom_steps:

and Clicks Log in
custom_expected:

title: User navigates to Intl Signing Bonus Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Intl Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Intl Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: User verifies Remaining Pool amount is correct
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is viewing the Intl signing bonus utility
custom_steps: WHEN user checks Remaining Pool amount
custom_expected: THEN this amount equals Signing Bonus Pool minus Total Signing Bonuses

title: User creates 1st intl contract with signing bonus larger than remaining pool
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN user creates a first year international contract for an international amateur
AND adds a Signing Bonus w/ Visa for an amount greater than the Remaining Pool from the Intl Signing Bonus Utility
AND user fills in all other required fields
AND user clicks submit
custom_expected: THEN user should be prompted with a hard error message indicating they've exceeded the Intl Signing Bonus pool amount

and Clicks Log in
custom_expected:

title: User looks for specific signing period in the past
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is viewing Intl Signing Bonus Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN selects Org to be TB
AND Signing Period to be 2012-2013
custom_expected: THEN data appears on the page and in the table (note the UI will be slightly different in prior years)

custom_steps:

AND Clicks login
custom_expected: THEN User successfully logs into ebis 2.5 homepage

custom_steps:

title: User clicks edit button
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is viewing Intl Signing Bonus utility widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks edit button
custom_expected: THEN the Intl Signing Bonus utility widget goes into edit mode

title: User adds a row to the table
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on the Intl Signing bonus Utility
AND the page is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks the add row button below the Signing Bonus Pool table
custom_expected: THEN a new row is added to the Signing Bonus Pool table

title: User enters player name and projected signing bonus
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on Intl signing bonus utility
AND and is in edit mode
AND has added a new row to the signing bonus pool table
custom_steps:
WHEN User enters a date into the date field of the new row
AND enters an amount in the amount field
AND enters a description into the description field
custom_expected: THEN date, amount, and description should show in the table, still in edit mode

title: User clicks Save
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has added a new row with fields populated
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN the new row is successfully saved to the table in view mode
